org.finra.hqlunit.resources

Class LocalFileResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.finra.hqlunit.resources.InputStreamResource
      • org.finra.hqlunit.resources.LocalFileResource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TextResource

    public class LocalFileResource
extends InputStreamResource
    Handles access to text resources contained in files on the local file system

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LocalFileResource(String filePath)
      Constructs a TextResource that reads out the content of a file on the local file system
